register.reg_long_name: Performance Monitors Count Enable Set register

purpose_text.para: Enables the Cycle Count Register, PMCCNTR_EL0, and any implemented event counters PMEVCNTR<n>. Reading this register shows which counters are enabled.

field_description.para: PMCCNTR_EL0 enable bit. Enables the cycle counter register. Possible values are:

field_value_description.para: When read, means the cycle counter is disabled. When written, has no effect.
When read, means the cycle counter is enabled. When written, enables the cycle counter.

field_description.para: Event counter enable bit for PMEVCNTR<n>_EL0.

If N is less than 31, then bits [30:N] are RAZ/WI. When EL2 is implemented and enabled in the current Security state, in EL1 and EL0, N is the value in MDCR_EL2.HPMN. Otherwise, N is the value in PMCR_EL0.N.

field_value_description.para: When read, means that PMEVCNTR<n>_EL0 is disabled. When written, has no effect.
When read, means that PMEVCNTR<n>_EL0 event counter is enabled. When written, enables PMEVCNTR<n>_EL0.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
